title: The one astonishing way to ace an interview
text:
Absurdly Driven looks at the world of business with a skeptical eye and a firmly rooted tongue in cheek. Pre-interview nerves? Oh, so much pish. Worried about whether they'll like you, whether you'll say the right thing -- or merely the thing they want to hear, whatever that is? Don't fret.
See the full story at Inc. Magazine
